(1)
153-161 Pierrepont Street, north side, west of Fulton Street. The horse is typical of those used by New York's mounted policemen.

November 10, 1933.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, showing only Nos. 159-161.
February 5, 1931.

P. L. Sperr.

(3)
The same, showing view to Fulton Street at right.
February 5, 1931.

P. L. Sperr.
